display_name: A I R O T C I V[RedSpiderLily]
note:
I'm a myth.

Always on my own side like my job. Creating wicked and odd stuff that come to life. I have always been like this for 40 something years of my breathing years.

I hate all things F1.

I believe in tolerance—which is not the same as syncretism—it's not even the same as toleration and acceptance. But, most of the time, it'll also depend whether my heart like you or not. What!?

✉️ : rukiakrampus@gmail.com
